oai_dc:dc.dc:title: Confederate soldier with bayoneted rifle
oai_dc:dc.dc:description: Studio carte de visite of a uniformed Confederate soldier standing with a bayoneted rifle. He is wearing a cape and kepi. At bottom is written in pen, "Innocence." Lower left page, lower left corner on album page 101.
oai_dc:dc.dc:subject: Carte de visite; United States--History--Civil War, 1861-1865--Portraits; Confederate States of America--History; United States--History--Civil War, 1861-1865
Soldiers; Rifles; Capes (Clothing)
